languages.text: Джай избавилась от давнего конкурента и взяла передышку в погоне за великими возможностями. Была ли плата за спокойствие справедливой? Едва ли. Но было ли хоть что-то справедливым в ее жизни?

traits.locale_text: Джай избавилась от давнего конкурента и взяла передышку в погоне за великими возможностями. Была ли плата за спокойствие справедливой? Едва ли. Но было ли хоть что-то справедливым в ее жизни?

languages.text: Jae eliminated an old competitor and took a break from chasing grand opportunities. She has bought herself some peace and quiet, but was the price fair? Hardly. But when has life ever been fair to her?
languages.original_text: Джай избавилась от давнего конкурента и взяла передышку в погоне за великими возможностями. Была ли плата за спокойствие справедливой? Едва ли. Но было ли хоть что-то справедливым в ее жизни?

traits.locale_text: Jae eliminated an old competitor and took a break from chasing grand opportunities. She bought herself some peace and quiet, but was the price fair? Hardly. But when was life ever fair to her?
Jae eliminated an old competitor and took a break from chasing grand opportunities. She bought herself some peace and quiet, but was the price fair? Hardly. But when was life ever fair to her?

Jae eliminated an old competitor and took a break from chasing grand opportunities. She has bought herself some peace and quiet, but was the price fair? Hardly. But when has life ever been fair to her?

Jae eliminated an old competitor and took a break from chasing grand opportunities. She has bought herself some peace and quiet, but was the price fair? Hardly. But when has life ever been fair to her?

languages.text: Jae a éliminé un vieux concurrent et cessé pendant quelque temps de courir après les opportunités. Cela lui a permis de retrouver un peu de calme et de tranquillité, mais le prix à payer était-il juste ? Certainement pas. Cependant, elle a l'habitude de l'injustice.
languages.original_text: Jae eliminated an old competitor and took a break from chasing grand opportunities. She has bought herself some peace and quiet, but was the price fair? Hardly. But when has life ever been fair to her?

traits.locale_text: Jae a éliminé un vieux concurrent et cessé pendant quelque temps de courir après les opportunités. Cela lui a permis de retrouver un peu de calme et de tranquillité, mais le prix à payer était-il juste ? Certainement pas. Cependant, elle a l'habitude de l'injustice.

languages.text: 婕伊消灭了老对手，暂时可以歇口气了。她得到了安宁与和平的生活，但如此惨重的代价真的公平吗？恐怕一点都不公平。但话说回来，命运什么时候对她公平过？
languages.original_text: Jae eliminated an old competitor and took a break from chasing grand opportunities. She has bought herself some peace and quiet, but was the price fair? Hardly. But when has life ever been fair to her?

traits.locale_text: 婕伊消灭了老对手，暂时可以歇口气了。她得到了安宁与和平的生活，但如此惨重的代价真的公平吗？恐怕一点都不公平。但话说回来，命运什么时候对她公平过？

languages.text: ジェイは昔からの宿敵を排除し、一攫千金を狙う毎日に区切りをつけた。彼女は平和と平穏を手に入れたのだが、その代償は妥当だったのだろうか？そうとは言い難い。しかし彼女の人生で、公平な時などあっただろうか？
languages.original_text: Jae eliminated an old competitor and took a break from chasing grand opportunities. She has bought herself some peace and quiet, but was the price fair? Hardly. But when has life ever been fair to her?

traits.locale_text: ジェイは昔からの宿敵を排除し、一攫千金を狙う毎日に区切りをつけた。彼女は平和と平穏を手に入れたのだが、その代償は妥当だったのだろうか？そうとは言い難い。しかし彼女の人生で、公平な時などあっただろうか？

languages.text: Jae hat einen alten Rivalen ausgeschaltet und kann nun ein wenig Pause von der Jagd nach großen Gelegenheiten machen. Sie hat sich ein wenig Frieden und Ruhe erkauft, aber war der Preis fair? Wohl kaum. Aber wann war das Leben je fair zu ihr?
languages.original_text: Jae eliminated an old competitor and took a break from chasing grand opportunities. She has bought herself some peace and quiet, but was the price fair? Hardly. But when has life ever been fair to her?

traits.locale_text: Jae hat einen alten Rivalen ausgeschaltet und kann nun ein wenig Pause von der Jagd nach großen Gelegenheiten machen. Sie hat sich ein wenig Frieden und Ruhe erkauft, aber war der Preis fair? Wohl kaum. Aber wann war das Leben je fair zu ihr?

languages.text: Jae ha eliminado a un viejo rival y se ha tomado un respiro de buscar grandes oportunidades. Por fin tiene algo de paz y tranquilidad. ¿Acaso ha sido justo el precio que ha pagado? En absoluto, pero, ¿desde cuándo ha sido justa la vida con ella?
languages.original_text: Jae eliminated an old competitor and took a break from chasing grand opportunities. She has bought herself some peace and quiet, but was the price fair? Hardly. But when has life ever been fair to her?

traits.locale_text: Jae ha eliminado a un viejo rival y se ha tomado un respiro de buscar grandes oportunidades. Por fin tiene algo de paz y tranquilidad. ¿Acaso ha sido justo el precio que ha pagado? En absoluto, pero, ¿desde cuándo ha sido justa la vida con ella?
